biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Sean Patrick Thomas (born December 17, 1970) is an American actor. He is perhaps best known for his co-starring role in the 2001 film Save the Last Dance, as well as his television role as Detective Temple Page in The District.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Sean Patrick Thomas, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Sean Patrick Thomas
